code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var tokenSlice=createSlice({name:"token",initialState:{accessTokenBearer:""},reducers:{getToken:function getToken(state){var urlSearchParams=new URLSearchParams(window.location.hash.substring(1));var accessToken=urlSearchParams.get('access_token');var accessTokenBearer="Bearer ".concat(accessToken);state.accessTokenBearer=accessTokenBearer;}}});var getToken=tokenSlice.actions.getToken;export{getToken};export default tokenSlice.reducer;
